{"id":1338598878,"question_id":3,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 4 weeks","timestamp":1722354192,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1338598878/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int n=s.size();\n        int prev=-1;\n        int sz=1;\n        map<char,int>mp;\n        for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++){\n            if(mp.count(s[i])!=0){\n            prev=max(prev,mp[s[i]]);}\n\n            mp[s[i]]=i;\n\n            sz=max(sz,i-prev);\n        }\n        return sz;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
